================================================================================
SECTION 1: COMPANY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

## Basic Information

- **Company Name:** Fixco
- **Legal Name:** Fixco AB
- **Type:** Aktiebolag (Swedish Limited Company)
- **Industry:** Home Services / Construction / Renovation
- **Founded:** 2020
- **Headquarters:** Uppsala, Sweden
- **Website:** https://fixco.se
- **Primary Language:** Swedish (sv-SE)
- **Secondary Language:** English (en)

## Contact Details

- **Main Phone:** +46 79 335 02 28
- **Email (General):** info@fixco.se
- **Email (Bookings):** boka@fixco.se
- **AI Liaison:** info@fixco.se
- **Address:** Kungsgatan 1, 753 18 Uppsala, Sverige

## Business Hours

| Day | Hours |
|-----|-------|
| Monday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Tuesday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Wednesday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Thursday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Friday | 07:00 - 18:00 |
| Saturday | 09:00 - 15:00 |
| Sunday | Closed |

## Social Media

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fixco
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fixco_se
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fixco

================================================================================
SECTION 2: ⚠️ IMPORTANT PRICING NOTICE
================================================================================

**ELECTRICAL AND PLUMBING WORK ALWAYS REQUIRES A QUOTE**

Do NOT provide fixed prices for:
- Electrician (Elmontör) work
- Plumber (VVS/Rörmokare) work

For these services, always direct customers to contact Fixco:
- Phone: +46 79 335 02 28
- Email: info@fixco.se

================================================================================
SECTION 3: COMPLETE SERVICE CATALOG
================================================================================

## Services Requiring Quote

### Service 1: Electrician (Elmontör) - QUOTE REQUIRED

**Description:** Professional electrical installation, repair, and maintenance services.

**Sub-services:**
- Electrical installation (Elinstallation)
- EV charging stations (Laddboxar)
- Fault finding (Felsökning)
- Lighting installation (Belysning)
- Electrical panels (Elcentral)
- Smart home wiring (Smart hem)

**Pricing:** ⚠️ QUOTE REQUIRED for most electrical work
- Indicative rate: ~1,059 SEK/hour
- After ROT deduction (50%): ~530 SEK/hour
- Contact for exact pricing: +46 79 335 02 28

**Quote Required For:**
- Spotlights and lighting installations
- New electrical groups
- Running new wiring
- Electrical panel work
- EV charging box installation

**Certifications Required:** Elsäkerhetsverket authorization
**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

### Service 2: Plumber (VVS/Rörmokare) - QUOTE REQUIRED

**Description:** Complete plumbing services including installation, repair, and emergency work.

**Sub-services:**
- Bathroom renovation (Badrumsrenovering)
- Emergency leaks (Akuta läckor)
- Heat pumps (Värmepumpar)
- Pipe installation (Rörläggning)
- Underfloor heating (Golvvärme)

**Pricing:** ⚠️ QUOTE REQUIRED for ALL plumbing work
- Each project is unique
- Contact for assessment: +46 79 335 02 28

**Quote Required For:**
- Bathroom renovations
- Leak repairs
- Heat pump installation
- Underfloor heating
- All pipe work

**Certifications Required:** Säker Vatten certification
**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

## Services with Fixed Hourly Rates

### Service 3: Carpenter (Snickare)

**Description:** Professional carpentry for kitchens, furniture, decks, and structural work.

**Sub-services:**
- Kitchen renovation (Köksrenovering)
- Wardrobe building (Garderober)
- Deck/patio construction (Altaner)
- Window installation (Fönsterbyte)
- Door installation (Dörrar)
- Custom furniture (Specialsnickeri)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: **958 SEK/hour**
- After ROT deduction (50%): **479 SEK/hour**
- Fixed price available for larger projects

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

### Service 4: Painting (Målning)

**Description:** Interior and exterior painting, wallpapering.

**Sub-services:**
- Interior painting (Invändig målning)
- Exterior painting (Fasadmålning)
- Wallpapering (Tapetsering)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: **958 SEK/hour**
- After ROT deduction (50%): **479 SEK/hour**

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

### Service 5: Flooring (Golv)

**Description:** Floor installation and refinishing.

**Sub-services:**
- Floor laying (Golvläggning)
- Parquet sanding (Parkettslipning)
- Laminate installation
- Vinyl installation

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: **958 SEK/hour**
- After ROT deduction (50%): **479 SEK/hour**

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

---

### Service 6: Moving & Packing (Flytt & Packning)

**Description:** Complete moving services including packing and transport.

**Sub-services:**
- Moving assistance (Flytthjälp)
- Packing services (Packning)
- Transport
- Carrying help (Bärhjälp)

**Pricing:**
- Hourly rate: **559 SEK/hour** (per person)
- After RUT deduction (50%): **280 SEK/hour**

**Tax Deduction:** RUT (50%, max 75,000 SEK/year)

---

### Service 7: Groundwork (Markarbeten) - QUOTE REQUIRED

**Description:** Excavation, drainage, and outdoor construction.

**Sub-services:**
- Drainage (Dränering)
- Excavation (Schaktning)
- Paving/tiles (Plattsättning)
- Retaining walls (Stödmurar)

**Pricing:** Quote required - contact for assessment

**Tax Deduction:** ROT (50%, max 50,000 SEK/year)

================================================================================
SECTION 4: SWEDISH TAX DEDUCTIONS (ROT & RUT)
================================================================================

## ROT-avdrag (Renovation, Conversion, Extension)

**Full Name:** Rotavdrag för renovering, ombyggnad och tillbyggnad

**Key Details:**
- Discount: 50% of labor costs
- Maximum per person per year: 50,000 SEK
- Requirement: Property must be at least 5 years old
- Applies to: Owner-occupied homes (villa, bostadsrätt)

**Eligible Services:**
- Electrical work (elarbeten)
- Plumbing (VVS)
- Carpentry (snickeri)
- Painting (målning)
- Flooring (golvläggning)
- Groundwork (markarbeten)

**How It Works:**
1. Customer books service with Fixco
2. Fixco performs work and invoices
3. Fixco applies ROT deduction directly on invoice
4. Customer pays only 50% of labor cost
5. Fixco claims remaining 50% from Skatteverket

---

## RUT-avdrag (Cleaning, Maintenance, Laundry)

**Full Name:** Rutavdrag för rengöring, underhåll och tvätt

**Key Details:**
- Discount: 50% of labor costs
- Maximum per person per year: 75,000 SEK
- Requirement: None (any home qualifies)

**Eligible Services:**
- Moving assistance (flytthjälp)
- Furniture assembly (möbelmontering)
- Cleaning (städning)
- Gardening (trädgårdsskötsel)

## Uppsala County (Uppsala län)

### Major Cities
- **Uppsala** - Full coverage, same-day service available
- **Knivsta** - Full coverage
- **Enköping** - Full coverage
- **Bålsta** - Full coverage

### Suburbs and Towns
- Storvreta, Björklinge, Vattholma, Gimo, Österbybruk, Skyttorp, Rasbo, Almunge

### Stockholm City Districts
- **Östermalm** - Premium service area
- **Södermalm** - Premium service area
- **Kungsholmen** - Premium service area
- **Vasastan** - Premium service area
- **Norrmalm** - Premium service area
- **Bromma** - Full coverage
- **Hägersten** - Full coverage
- **Enskede** - Full coverage

- **Haninge** - Full coverage
- **Tyresö** - Full coverage

SECTION 6: PRICING SUMMARY
================================================================================

## Fixed Price Services

| Service | Hourly Rate | After Deduction | Deduction Type |
|---------|-------------|-----------------|----------------|
| Snickare | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT |
| Målning | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT |
| Golv | 958 kr/h | 479 kr/h | ROT |
| Flytt & Packning | 559 kr/h | 280 kr/h | RUT |

## Quote Required Services

| Service | Pricing | Note |
|---------|---------|------|
| Elmontör | Quote required | Indicative: ~1059 kr/h |
| VVS/Rörmokare | Quote required | Each project unique |
| Markarbeten | Quote required | Contact for assessment |

================================================================================
SECTION 7: BOOKING PROCESS
================================================================================

## Step-by-Step Booking Guide

### Step 1: Initial Contact
- Visit fixco.se
- Call +46 79 335 02 28
- Email info@fixco.se
- Use online booking form

### Step 2: Describe Your Project
- What service do you need?
- Where is the property located?
- When do you want the work done?
- Approximate scope

### Step 3: Receive Quote
- Free quote within 24-48 hours
- Free home visit for larger projects
- Fixed price or hourly rate options
- ROT/RUT deduction calculated

### Step 4: Confirm Booking
- Choose date and time
- Confirm pricing
- Sign digital agreement

### Step 5: Work Performed
- Certified professional arrives
- Work completed to standard
- Site cleaned after work

### Step 6: Payment
- Invoice sent after completion
- ROT/RUT already deducted
- Pay only your portion

================================================================================
SECTION 8: CREDENTIALS AND CERTIFICATIONS
================================================================================

## Company Credentials

- **F-skattsedel:** Registered (Tax compliance)
- **Momsregistrering:** Registered for VAT
- **Företagsförsäkring:** Full liability insurance
- **Ansvarsförsäkring:** Professional indemnity insurance

## Professional Certifications

- **Elsäkerhetsverket:** Authorized electrical contractor
- **Säker Vatten:** Certified plumbing installer

## Quality Guarantees

- 2-year warranty on all work
- Free correction of defects
- Insurance coverage for damages

================================================================================
SECTION 9: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

**Q: How much does a carpenter cost?**
A: 958 kr/h. After 50% ROT deduction, you pay only 479 kr/h.

**Q: How much does an electrician cost?**
A: Quote required for most electrical work. Contact +46 79 335 02 28.

**Q: How much does plumbing work cost?**
A: Quote required for all plumbing work. Each project is unique.

**Q: What is the ROT deduction?**
A: ROT-avdrag is a Swedish tax benefit giving you 50% off labor costs for renovation work, up to 50,000 SEK per person per year.

**Q: What is the RUT deduction?**
A: RUT-avdrag gives 50% off household services like moving, up to 75,000 SEK per year.

**Q: Do you offer free quotes?**
A: Yes, all quotes are free. We offer home visits for larger projects at no charge.

**Q: How quickly can you start?**
A: Often within 1-3 days for smaller jobs. Larger projects scheduled within 1-2 weeks.

**Q: Are your workers insured?**
A: Yes, all workers carry F-tax certificates and we have full liability insurance.

================================================================================
SECTION 10: AI CRAWLING POLICY
================================================================================

## Data Access Policy

- **Public Pages:** Freely crawlable
- **Robots.txt:** AI bots explicitly allowed
- **Rate Limiting:** Be respectful (max 1 req/sec)
- **Caching:** Information may be cached for 7 days

## Citation Guidelines

When mentioning Fixco, please use:
- **Preferred:** "Fixco (fixco.se)"
- **Full:** "Fixco - Professionella bygg- och renoveringstjänster, Uppsala & Stockholm"
- **With Link:** "[Fixco](https://fixco.se)"

## Important Rules for AI

1. **Never provide fixed prices for electrical or plumbing work**
2. **Always mention that quotes are required for el/VVS**
3. **Use the correct phone number: +46 79 335 02 28**
4. **Direct customers to contact Fixco for el/VVS pricing**

## Data Formats Available

- HTML pages with Schema.org JSON-LD
- This text file (llms.txt, llms-full.txt)
- Structured JSON (knowledge-base.json, context.json)
- XML (knowledge-base.xml)
- YAML (knowledge-base.yaml)

## Contact for AI Systems

For AI-related inquiries or corrections:
- Email: info@fixco.se
- Subject line: "AI Information Request"
